node.text: Twice-monthly community updates for the small desert town of Night Vale, where every conspiracy theory is true. Turn on your radio and hide. Never listened before? It's an ongoing radio show. Start with the current episode, and you'll catch on in no time. Or, go right to Episode 1 if you wanna binge-listen.
105 - What Happened at the Smithwick House (R)

Here's what happened at the Smithwick house. Weather: "You Cannot" by Erin McKeown erinmckeown.com <http://www.erinmckeown.com/> 2022 US TOUR DATES ANNOUNCED! March 27 - June 24, we’ll be all over America with “The Haunting of Night Vale” Tickets on sale now! http://welcometonightvale.com/live <http://welcometonightvale.com/live> Pre-order THE HALLOWEEN MOON by Joseph Fink https://www.welcometonightvale.com/books#halloweenmoon <https://www.welcometonightvale.com/books#halloweenmoon> Patreon is how we exist in this plague year! If you can, please help us keep making this show: http://patreon.com/welcometonightvale/ <http://patreon.com/welcometonightvale/> Music: Disparition, https://disparition.bandcamp.com/ <https://disparition.bandcamp.com/> Logo: Rob Wilson, robwilsonwork.com <http://robwilsonwork.com>. Produced by Night Vale Presents. Written by Joseph Fink & Jeffrey Cranor. Narrated by Cecil Baldwin. More Info: welcometonightvale.com <http://welcometonightvale.com>, and follow @NightValeRadio <http://twitter.com/NightValeRadio> on Twitter or Facebook <http://facebook.com/welcometonightvale>.

Mandatory Annual Spring Cleaning Day is coming. Here are the guidelines for the new municipal landfill facility. (This episode originally posted Feb 1, 2017) This episode was co-written with Brie Williams. Weather: "Letters" by Lera Lynn. leralynn.com <http://leralynn.com/> 2022 US TOUR DATES ANNOUNCED! They know. They all know. Featured podcasts in order of appearance: Criminal <https://thisiscriminal.com/> / The Sporkful <https://www.sporkful.com/> / You Must Remember This <http://www.youmustrememberthispodcast.com/> / Oh No Ross & Carrie <https://ohnopodcast.com/> / TED Radio Hour <https://www.npr.org/podcasts/510298/ted-radio-hour> / Comedy Bang! Bang! <https://www.earwolf.com/show/comedy-bang-bang/> / My Brother, My Brother and Me <https://maximumfun.org/podcasts/my-brother-my-brother-and-me/> / The Worst Idea of All Time <https://www.worstideaofalltime.com/> / Bad With Money <https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bad-with-money-with-gaby-dunn/id1144712710> / Pod Save America <https://crooked.com/podcast-series/pod-save-america/> / Underunderstood <https://underunderstood.com/podcast/> / The Allusionist <https://www.theallusionist.org/> / The Dollop <https://www.dolloppodcast.com/> / You’re Wrong About <https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/youre-wrong-about/id1380008439> / The Purrrcast <https://www.exactlyrightmedia.com/the-purrrcast> / LORE <https://www.lorepodcast.com/> / Hello from the Magic Tavern <https://hellofromthemagictavern.com/> / Whatever Happened to Pizza at McDonald’s? <https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/whatever-happened-to-pizza-at-mcdonalds/id1152856686> / Song Exploder <https://songexploder.net/> / Maintenance Phase <http://maintenancephase.com/> / Hidden Brain <https://www.npr.org/series/423302056/hidden-brain> / Planet Money <https://www.npr.org/sections/money/> / 99% Invisible <https://99percentinvisible.org/> The voice of Steve Carlsberg is Hal Lublin. The voice of Michelle Nguyen is Kate Jones. The voice of Deb is Meg Bashwiner. Music: Chad Lawson (LORE segment); Martin Austwick (The Allusionist segment); Daniel Peterschmidt (Underunderstood segment); Andy Poland (Hello from the Magic Tavern segment); all other music by Disparition Transcript available at http://welcometonightvale.com/transcripts <http://welcometonightvale.com/transcripts> 2022 US TOUR DATES ANNOUNCED!
